resources.string: Respect is the recognition of the inherent value and dignity of each individual.
Optimism is the belief that good things will happen and that challenges will be overcome.
Kindness is the quality of being friendly, generous, and considerate.
Happiness is a state of mind that comes from positive emotions and a sense of well-being.
Giving is the act of sharing what we have with others, be it time, resources, or love.
